overview:
Henrik has wide experience in the IT industry gained in management positions with software companies and most recently with a venture capital company. He started to build up his experience in 1987 and has held positions with 2M Invest (Investment Partner), Damgaard Group (Sales Manager/Business Developer/International Project Sales/IT Project Manager), been a self-employed IT consultant developing software solutions for measurement devices and worked for Simcorp (Project Manager/Developer, Software Projects).

Henrik has an M.Sc. in Engineering, Computer Science from the Technical University of Denmark and an E*MBA from SiMi.

email: hal@nordic.com
